_sText:
zm_evilrats_final is the last and best version of my zm rat map, which is completely based on ag_rats. I added lots of secrets, barricading zones and basically things that allow zombie gameplay.

I think that almost all if not all the 'cading spots are balanced enough to be not imposible, but it may depend of your server settings; for example, some spots may become a bit lame with zprops (with big ones, wood boxes and driers should be fine in most spots)

40 slots, small size, I really recomend parachute and noblock. It's also a good idea to explore the map before playing because there are lots of secret places.
